description: The details related to a potential delivery time.

deliveryWindowID.description: A unique identifier for a deliveryWindow

startDate.description: The beginning of the delivery window. Preferred format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss-Z or yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.

endDate.description: The end of the delivery window. Preferred format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss-Z or yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.

cost.description: The cost associated with delivering an order at this time.

fee.description: A fee charged to the user selecting this deliveryWindow.

pointsEarned.description: The number of points that could potentially be earned if the user opts into one.
